Package jrigby.openstack_queue.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResourceProvisioningCallback
    Provides callback methods once resources have been created in the cloud.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorizedKeysList
    Maintains a list of authorised SSH keys in the user's home directory.
    JobStatus
    Defines a submitted job's status in the queue
    OSConnection
    Provides a simplified abstraction to the OpenStack API
    OSCredentials
    Credentials to be passed to the OSConnection object
    QueueCommandProcessor
    Processes any command received that alters the queue state e.g.
    QueueServer
    Program entry point
    RedisConstants
    A set of constants for the redis services
    RedisQueueStatusPublisher
    Publishes the state of the queue at a set interval
    RedisSubscriber
    Receives redis messages and directs them to the QueueCommandProcessor
    ResourceQueue
    The job queue.
    ResourceRequest
    Specifies a job to execute that is submitted to a ResourceQueue.
    ResourceUsage
    Specifies consumed resources.
    ServerCollection
    A set of servers that have been dedicated to a particular ResourceRequest.
    ServerSettings
    An abstraction from the configuration file that specifies all server settings.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    QueueCommandProcessor.CommandType
    Command type enumeration
    ResourceQueue.QueueStatus
    A status designation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InsufficientResourcesException
    Thrown when there are insufficient cloud resources to fulfill the request.
    QueueCommandException
    Thrown when a malformed queue command is encountered
    ResourcesPermanentlyExceededException
    Thrown when the request will never fit within the queue quotas.
    ResourcesTemporarilyExceededException
    Thrown when the currently running jobs have reduced the available instances/CPUs such that this job cannot currently run.
